sentence.Network_en: He was hollow - chested, squint - eyed, and rather shambling, but spry enough withal.
sentence.Network_cn: 他胸膛低陷, 眼睛斜视, 步履蹒跚, 但又着实生气勃勃.

sentence.Network_en: Her family doctor broke the news to her that her son was squint - eyed.
sentence.Network_cn: 家庭医生向她透露一个坏消息:她儿子患了斜视.

sentence.Network_en: Three cannabis plants were found by eagle-eyed police officers.
sentence.Network_cn: 火眼金睛的警官发现了3株大麻。

he was hollow-chested , squint-eyed , and rather shambling , but spry enough withal .他胸膛低陷，眼睛斜视，步履蹒跚，但又着实生气勃勃。
walleyes 医学中用的较多.squint-eyed口语中常用

means.word_mean: 2. (used especially of glances) directed to one side with or as if with doubt or suspicion or envy;

sentences.sentence: "her eyes with their misted askance look"- Elizabeth Bowen
